synopsis.text:
Havoc looms over the kingdom of Metallicana as the Four Lords, each possessing formidable abilities, strive to awaken the dreaded god Anthrasax, threatening to plunge the world into chaos. To thwart their nefarious plans, High Priest Geo enlists the aid of the infamous warlock, Dark Schneider, once an ally to these villains and a man with a penchant for destruction. But there's a catch - Dark Schneider has been reincarnated into the body of a 14-year-old boy, thanks to the virgin kiss of Yoko, a brave maiden of Metallicana.

Dark Schneider, now a blend of innocence and dark power, finds himself in a predicament. On one hand, he's expected to save the very people who once imprisoned him, and on the other, he's tempted to join his old comrades, including his ex-girlfriend, in their quest for world domination. However, with his newfound love interest, Yoko, and his insatiable thirst for excitement, Dark Schneider might just be the unpredictable hero Metallicana needs. Will he stand against his former allies and the ancient evil they seek to awaken, or will he succumb to his chaotic nature and join the forces of destruction? Only time will tell in this thrilling tale of power, betrayal, and redemption.
